com.yworks.yfiles.graph

Interface IStripe

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILabelOwner, ILookup, IModelItem, ITagOwner
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IColumn, IRow

    public interface IStripe
extends ILabelOwner
    This interface defines a child element of a table or a table element container.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.yworks.yfiles.graph.ILookup

        EMPTY

    • Method Detail

      • getAbsoluteBounds

        default RectD getAbsoluteBounds(INode node)
        Returns the layout of stripe in absolute coordinates.

        Since Layout is relative to the owning node's left corner, you need to provide an node node to calculate the absolute layout.

        Parameters:
        node - The node relative to which the stripe layout is calculated. This should be the same node where Table for stripe is associated to.

      • getActualInsets

        default InsetsD getActualInsets()
        Gets the insets that are currently in effect for this stripe.

        This value is determined by the accumulated insets of all ancestor, sibling and descendant insets. These insets may be larger than Insets.

        Returns:
        The actual insets of the stripe.

      • getActualMinSize

        default double getActualMinSize()
        Returns the actual minimum size a stripe can acquire.

        This is the maximum of MinimumSize and the horizontal or vertical Insets.

      • getActualSize

        default double getActualSize()
        The current actual dimension of the stripe.

        This is always the stripe size which is actually used for the stripe. For leaf stripes, this is the same as Size, otherwise, it is the accumulated size of all descendants with taking nested insets into account.

        Returns:
        The actual size of the stripe.

      • getChildStripes

        default IEnumerable<IStripe> getChildStripes()
        Gets the direct children of stripe in a table hierarchy.

        For IColumn instances, this returns ChildColumns, for IRow instances, this returns ChildRows

        Returns:
        the children of stripe
        See Also:
        IColumn.getChildColumns(), IRow.getChildRows()

      • getDescendants

        default IEnumerable<IStripe> getDescendants()
        Returns a collection of all descendants of stripe.

        The descendants are returned in top to bottom order.

        Returns:
        A collection of all descendants of stripe

      • getIndex

        default int getIndex()
        Gets the index of stripe in its getParentStripe() collection of getChildStripes().

        The stripe is the GetIndexth child of its parent.

        Returns:
        the children of stripe
        See Also:
        IColumn.getChildColumns(), IRow.getChildRows()

      • getInsets

        InsetsD getInsets()
        Gets the insets for this stripe.

        These insets are applied in addition to any implicit insets provided by the child stripes. To find out the actual insets that are currently in effect, use getActualInsets().

        Returns:
        The Insets.

      • getLayout

        IRectangle getLayout()
        Returns a live view of the relative layout of the stripe.

        The layout of a stripe is a rectangle in the coordinate system that is relative to the upper left corner of the parent. Since this method will yield a live view, it is up to the client to copy the values of the instance if a snapshot of the state is needed.

        Returns:
        The Layout.

      • getLeaves

        default IEnumerable<IStripe> getLeaves()
        Returns a collection of all descendants of stripe that are leaves and therefore don't have any child stripes.
        Returns:
        A collection of all leaf descendants of stripe

      • getMinimumSize

        double getMinimumSize()
        The minimal permissible value for Size.

        This value determines how much the stripe may be shrunk by interactive manipulation.

        Returns:
        The MinimumSize.

      • getParentStripe

        default IStripe getParentStripe()
        Gets the parent of stripe in a table hierarchy.

        For IColumn instances, this returns ParentColumn, for IRow instances, this returns ParentRow

        Returns:
        the parent of stripe
        See Also:
        IColumn.getParentColumn(), IRow.getParentRow()

      • getRoot

        default IStripe getRoot()
        Gets the root of the stripe hierarchy of stripe in a table hierarchy.

        If the stripe is part of an ITable instance, this returns RootColumn for IColumn instances and ParentRow for RootRow instances

        Returns:
        the root of stripe
        See Also:
        ITable.getRootColumn(), ITable.getRootRow(), isRoot()

      • getSize

        double getSize()
        The current changeable dimension of the stripe.

        This is always the stripe size which is not implicitly determined by other stripes, i.e. the height for IRow instances and the width for IColumn instances.

        Returns:
        The Size.

      • getStyle

        IStripeStyle getStyle()
        Gets the style for this stripe.
        Returns:
        The Style.

      • getTable

        ITable getTable()
        The ITable instance where this stripe is installed.
        Returns:
        The Table.

      • isRoot

        default boolean isRoot()
        Checks whether stripe is the root item of a stripe hierarchy.
        Returns:
        true iff stripe is a root stripe.
        See Also:
        getRoot()
